Reviews.Title: “Average”

Reviews.Content: poor breakfast looking cheap stay near center istanbul hotel bed im 9 1 2am dont expect 3 stars

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel ever.....”
Reviews.Author: marialena_an
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel boyfriend scary nights dirty noisy uncomfortable breakfast poor served staff speaking basic english location wouldnt recommende enemies

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money”
Reviews.Author: likos79
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 3 days searching budget hotel taxim view hotel excellent unlike 4 hotels taxim little bit clean staff polite helpful renovated 4 hotelsthe breakfast buffet rich variety definitely suggested clean economic hotel taxim

Reviews.Title: “unacceptable”
Reviews.Author: Melinda54
Reviews.Content: hotel inside disappointed plastic flowers view dirty maid coming didnt clean changed towels sometimes sheets cleaned hotel petty located istanbul cleanest cities

Reviews.Title: “Old 4star Hotel which needs to be reviewed again”
Reviews.Author: SaraGhavam1979
Reviews.Content: leakage toilet slightly unpleasant smell bathroom bedsheets breakfast ok perfect beatiful balkony view istanbul getting seated quit poor walk city center hotel quit close choice please openable windows

Reviews.Title: “The worst experience ever....not even a 1 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: honestreview11
Reviews.Content: 12 floors ground smelly corridors tiny ac dirty toilets bed feet hanging bed privacy hearing goes whispering cheap breakfast buffet staff rude unprofessional

Reviews.Title: “smelling room”
Reviews.Author: teo_maria
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 mistake change smelling awfull windows door didnt breakfast view middle huge pillar avoid move free wifi internet locked

Reviews.Title: “Bad Hotel, not 4 stars”
Reviews.Author: Xylola
Reviews.Content: hotel taksim square expected stay view didnt change ac bad recipient aggressive breakfast quiet low quality dont

Reviews.Title: “An adequate 3 star hotel, not close to tourist attractions.”
Reviews.Author: BradWPerth
Reviews.Content: stayed euro plaza hotel istanbul 5 nights august mixture business leisure time staff reasonable effort helpful pressured hotel business package tours russia iran guests arrive average comfortable reasonably clean breakfasts adequate location means decent hike taxi ride attractions st restaurants 10 min walk hotel 3star current 4 guests paying set expectations

Reviews.Title: “Depends on yr expectations”
Reviews.Author: Samah-Abu-Ghazaleh
Reviews.Content: bad depends personally didnt freeze money 5star hotel hotel particular please check pictures ive 1 fantastic panorama view unlike hotels taksim 2 breakfast varieties cheese cakes eggs etc pleasant view marmara sea 3 size tv whatever size comes watch news ac functions summer 4 oh wireless internet connection

HotelInfo.Name: Allstar Euro Plaza Hotel
